00064 
00065 GHOST_TUns64 GHOST_System::getMilliSeconds() const
00066 {
00067     GHOST_TUns64 millis = ::clock();
00068     if (CLOCKS_PER_SEC != 1000) {
00069         millis *= 1000;
00070         millis /= CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00071     }
00072     return millis;
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 GHOST_ITimerTask* GHOST_System::installTimer(GHOST_TUns64 delay,
00077                                              GHOST_TUns64 interval,
00078                                              GHOST_TimerProcPtr timerProc,
00079                                              GHOST_TUserDataPtr userData)
00080 {
00081     GHOST_TUns64 millis = getMilliSeconds();
00082     GHOST_TimerTask* timer = new GHOST_TimerTask(millis+delay, interval, timerProc, userData);
00083     if (timer) {
00084         if (m_timerManager->addTimer(timer) == GHOST_kSuccess) {
00085             // Check to see whether we need to fire the timer right away
00086             m_timerManager->fireTimers(millis);
00087         }
00088         else {
00089             delete timer;
00090             timer = 0;
00091         }
00092     }
00093     return timer;
00094 }

00097 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::removeTimer(GHOST_ITimerTask* timerTask)
00098 {
00099     GHOST_TSuccess success = GHOST_kFailure;
00100     if (timerTask) {
00101         success = m_timerManager->removeTimer((GHOST_TimerTask*)timerTask);
00102     }
00103     return success;
00104 }

00106 
00107 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::disposeWindow(GHOST_IWindow* window)
00108 {
00109     GHOST_TSuccess success;
00110 
00111     /*
00112      * Remove all pending events for the window.
00113      */ 
00114     if (m_windowManager->getWindowFound(window)) {
00115         m_eventManager->removeWindowEvents(window);
00116     }
00117     if (window == m_windowManager->getFullScreenWindow()) {
00118         success = endFullScreen();
00119     }
00120     else {
00121         if (m_windowManager->getWindowFound(window)) {
00122             success = m_windowManager->removeWindow(window);
00123             if (success) {
00124                 delete window;
00125             }
00126         }
00127         else {
00128             success = GHOST_kFailure;
00129         }
00130     }
00131     return success;
00132 }

00135 bool GHOST_System::validWindow(GHOST_IWindow* window)
00136 {
00137     return m_windowManager->getWindowFound(window);
00138 }

00140 
00141 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::beginFullScreen(const GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting, GHOST_IWindow** window,
00142                                              const bool stereoVisual, const GHOST_TUns16 numOfAASamples)
00143 {
00144     GHOST_TSuccess success = GHOST_kFailure;
00145     GHOST_ASSERT(m_windowManager, "GHOST_System::beginFullScreen(): invalid window manager")
00146     if (m_displayManager) {
00147         if (!m_windowManager->getFullScreen()) {
00148             m_displayManager->getCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_DisplayManager::kMainDisplay, m_preFullScreenSetting);
00149 
00150             //GHOST_PRINT("GHOST_System::beginFullScreen(): activating new display settings\n");
00151             success = m_displayManager->setCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_DisplayManager::kMainDisplay, setting);
00152             if (success == GHOST_kSuccess) {
00153                 //GHOST_PRINT("GHOST_System::beginFullScreen(): creating full-screen window\n");
00154                 success = createFullScreenWindow((GHOST_Window**)window, stereoVisual, numOfAASamples);
00155                 if (success == GHOST_kSuccess) {
00156                     m_windowManager->beginFullScreen(*window, stereoVisual);
00157                 }
00158                 else {
00159                     m_displayManager->setCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_DisplayManager::kMainDisplay, m_preFullScreenSetting);
00160                 }
00161             }
00162         }
00163     }
00164     if (success == GHOST_kFailure) {
00165         GHOST_PRINT("GHOST_System::beginFullScreen(): could not enter full-screen mode\n");
00166     }
00167     return success;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::updateFullScreen(const GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting, GHOST_IWindow** window)
00172 {
00173     GHOST_TSuccess success = GHOST_kFailure;
00174     GHOST_ASSERT(m_windowManager, "GHOST_System::updateFullScreen(): invalid window manager");
00175     if(m_displayManager) {
00176         if (m_windowManager->getFullScreen()) {
00177             success = m_displayManager->setCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_DisplayManager::kMainDisplay, setting);
00178         }
00179     }
00180 
00181     return success;
00182 }
00183 
00184 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::endFullScreen(void)
00185 {
00186     GHOST_TSuccess success = GHOST_kFailure;
00187     GHOST_ASSERT(m_windowManager, "GHOST_System::endFullScreen(): invalid window manager")
00188     if (m_windowManager->getFullScreen()) {
00189         //GHOST_IWindow* window = m_windowManager->getFullScreenWindow();
00190         //GHOST_PRINT("GHOST_System::endFullScreen(): leaving window manager full-screen mode\n");
00191         success = m_windowManager->endFullScreen();
00192         GHOST_ASSERT(m_displayManager, "GHOST_System::endFullScreen(): invalid display manager")
00193         //GHOST_PRINT("GHOST_System::endFullScreen(): leaving full-screen mode\n");
00194         success = m_displayManager->setCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_DisplayManager::kMainDisplay, m_preFullScreenSetting);
00195     }
00196     else {
00197         success = GHOST_kFailure;
00198     }
00199     return success;
00200 }
00201 
00202 
00203 bool GHOST_System::getFullScreen(void)
00204 {
00205     bool fullScreen;
00206     if (m_windowManager) {
00207         fullScreen = m_windowManager->getFullScreen();
00208     }
00209     else {
00210         fullScreen = false;
00211     }
00212     return fullScreen;
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 bool GHOST_System::dispatchEvents()
00217 {
00218     bool handled = false;
00219 
00220 #ifdef WITH_INPUT_NDOF
00221     // NDOF Motion event is sent only once per dispatch, so do it now:
00222     if (m_ndofManager) {
00223         handled |= m_ndofManager->sendMotionEvent();
00224     }
00225 #endif
00226 
00227     if (m_eventManager) {
00228         handled |= m_eventManager->dispatchEvents();
00229     }
00230 
00231     m_timerManager->fireTimers(getMilliSeconds());
00232     return handled;
00233 }

00238     GHOST_TSuccess success;
00239     if (m_eventManager) {
00240         success = m_eventManager->addConsumer(consumer);
00241     }
00242     else {
00243         success = GHOST_kFailure;
00244     }
00245     return success;
00246 }

00250     GHOST_TSuccess success;

00252         success = m_eventManager->removeConsumer(consumer);

00257     return success;

00272 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::getModifierKeyState(GHOST_TModifierKeyMask mask, bool& isDown) const
00273 {
00274     GHOST_ModifierKeys keys;
00275     // Get the state of all modifier keys 
00276     GHOST_TSuccess success = getModifierKeys(keys);
00277     if (success) {
00278         // Isolate the state of the key requested
00279         isDown = keys.get(mask);
00280     }
00281     return success;
00282 }

00285 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::getButtonState(GHOST_TButtonMask mask, bool& isDown) const
00286 {
00287     GHOST_Buttons buttons;
00288     // Get the state of all mouse buttons
00289     GHOST_TSuccess success = getButtons(buttons);
00290     if (success) {
00291         // Isolate the state of the mouse button requested
00292         isDown = buttons.get(mask);
00293     }
00294     return success;
00295 }
00296 
00297 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::init()
00298 {
00299     m_timerManager = new GHOST_TimerManager ();
00300     m_windowManager = new GHOST_WindowManager ();
00301     m_eventManager = new GHOST_EventManager ();
00302     
00303 #ifdef GHOST_DEBUG
00304     if (m_eventManager) {
00305         m_eventPrinter = new GHOST_EventPrinter();
00306         m_eventManager->addConsumer(m_eventPrinter);
00307     }
00308 #endif // GHOST_DEBUG
00309 
00310     if (m_timerManager && m_windowManager && m_eventManager) {
00311         return GHOST_kSuccess;
00312     } else {
00313         return GHOST_kFailure;
00314     }
00315 }

00317 
00318 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::exit()
00319 {
00320     if (getFullScreen()) {
00321         endFullScreen();
00322     }
00323     if (m_displayManager) {
00324         delete m_displayManager;
00325         m_displayManager = 0;
00326     }
00327     if (m_windowManager) {
00328         delete m_windowManager;
00329         m_windowManager = 0;
00330     }
00331     if (m_timerManager) {
00332         delete m_timerManager;
00333         m_timerManager = 0;
00334     }
00335     if (m_eventManager) {
00336         delete m_eventManager;
00337         m_eventManager = 0;
00338     }
00339 #ifdef WITH_INPUT_NDOF
00340     if (m_ndofManager) {
00341         delete m_ndofManager;
00342         m_ndofManager = 0;
00343     }
00344 #endif
00345     return GHOST_kSuccess;
00346 }

00348 
00349 GHOST_TSuccess GHOST_System::createFullScreenWindow(GHOST_Window** window, const bool stereoVisual, const GHOST_TUns16 numOfAASamples)
00350 {
00351     GHOST_TSuccess success;
00352     GHOST_ASSERT(m_displayManager, "GHOST_System::createFullScreenWindow(): invalid display manager")
00353     GHOST_DisplaySetting settings;
00354 
00355     success = m_displayManager->getCurrentDisplaySetting(GHOST_DisplayManager::kMainDisplay, settings);
00356     if (success) {
00357         //GHOST_PRINT("GHOST_System::createFullScreenWindow(): creating full-screen window\n");
00358         *window = (GHOST_Window*)createWindow(
00359                     STR_String (""),
00360                     0, 0, settings.xPixels, settings.yPixels,
00361                     GHOST_kWindowStateFullScreen,
00362                     GHOST_kDrawingContextTypeOpenGL,
00363                     stereoVisual,
00364                     numOfAASamples);
00365         success = *window == 0 ? GHOST_kFailure : GHOST_kSuccess;
00366     }
00367     return success;
00368 }

00371 int GHOST_System::confirmQuit(GHOST_IWindow * window) const
00372 {
00373     return 1;
00374 }
